item.title: Linux Kernel Debugging in VM
item.description: Kernel Debugging Instruction Setup I used VirtualBox for Kernel Debugging, VMWare shoud be able to do the same thing. Enter Machine Settings -> Ports -> Serial -> Enable Serial Port Port Number: Any :))) Port mode: Host Pipe Connect to existing : unchecked Path/Address: /tmp/vbox (placeholder purpose :)) Boot Linux normally, run as root $ echo ttyS0,9600 > /sys/module/kgdboc/parameters/kgdboc if Port Number is COM1, use ttyS0; if it is COM2, use ttyS1… etc
